title: PLEASE HELP, RP GLITCH ASAP

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: i purchased one of the $5 rp thingies with a credit card, it charged me for 3, even though i only got an amount of one purchase. Please help if you know how to fix this.

replies.body: For your specific and private account issue, please reach out to our billing team by submitting a [player support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)
so when will i get a response and how
You will receive a response within 24 hours or so and through the ticket you submitted.
do you know a solution or someone who has a solution?
